channel.title: Shop error
channel.description:
ok whenever i try to trade this shop it dcs me and gives me this
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17378) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16118) at client.packetSending(client.java:16087) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:48) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
i added this into my second click npc (middle one (herblore shop))
[code] } else if (NPCID == 561) { //Hood Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 62; //Hood Shop } else if (NPCID == 587) { // Jatix PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 75; //Herblore Shop }else if (NPCID == 529) { //Thieving Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 63; //Thieving Shop[/code]
I added this into my shops.cfg
[code]shop = 75 @gre@Herblore Shop 2 2 249 1350 253 1350 255 1350 257 1350 259 1350 227 5550 [/code]
And put him in auto spawn, but i cant trade him, it dcs me, talking does nothing. please help

item.title: Shop error
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Codez Epic Codez
item.description:
@Epic_Codez wrote:

You have shop errors you could have an extra space or an extra tab but try this

shop = 75 @gre@Herblore_Shop 2 2 249 1350 253 1350 255 1350 257 1350 259 1350 227 5550

Read full topic

item.title: Shop error
item.dc:creator: @slim_2021 slim_2021
item.description:
@slim_2021 wrote:

ok whenever i try to trade this shop it dcs me and gives me this

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17378) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16118) at client.packetSending(client.java:16087) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:48) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception

i added this into my second click npc (middle one (herblore shop))

} else if (NPCID == 561) { //Hood Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 62; //Hood Shop } else if (NPCID == 587) { // Jatix PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 75; //Herblore Shop }else if (NPCID == 529) { //Thieving Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 63; //Thieving Shop

I added this into my shops.cfg

shop = 75	@gre@Herblore Shop			2	2	249	1350	253	1350	255	1350	257	1350	259	1350	227	5550

And put him in auto spawn, but i cant trade him, it dcs me, talking does nothing. please help
